contact.title: We'd love to hear from you. Contact TTS to discuss your project, ask a question, or explore how we can work together.

seo.contact: Get in touch with TTS. Contact us today for questions about our projects. We look forward to hearing from you
seo.index: Professional renovation, plumbing, and tiling services in Switzerland. From complete home transformations to expert tile installation. Quality work by TTS Renovation.
tiles.description: For over 6 years, TTS has been the foundation of beautiful homes in our community. We know that choosing the right tile is a big decision, which is why we treat every project as if it were our own home.
tiles.description2: From the first consultation to the final sweep, we pride ourselves on honest advice, fair pricing, and impeccable installation. Discover the difference that true expertise and a passion for tile can make.
